synopsis: At 3:00 PM today, the center of Tropical Storm "ADA" {NOKAEN} was estimated based on all available data at 400 km East of Surigao City, Surigao del Norte (10.3°N, 129.1°E) with maximum sustained winds of 65 km/h near the center and gustiness of up to 80 km/h. It is moving Northwestward at 15 km/h. Northeast Monsoon affecting Northern and Central Luzon.
